post.text: Melania and I extend our warmest greetings to those observing Rosh Hashanah here in the United States, in Israel, and around the world.

comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: As a suburban wife and a mother. I am voting for Trump. Last time I checked him not paying taxes didn't cause deaths in Benghazi or threats to our national security! Tired of hearing how he doesn't have a woman's vote. I personally don't give a rats butt what he says that may be controversial. Last time I checked it was actions that spoke louder. Like the worthless and dangerous actions of the Clinton's! #teamtrump

replies.author: Colton
replies.text: Keep your citizenship papers handy, Miss Housekeeping

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: I'm an Armenian. Not sure what my citizenship papers have to do with choosing a good president.

replies.author: Colton
replies.text: You have an Hispanic surname. I hope you don't get deported by mistake.

replies.author: Cory
replies.text: Not only did he dodge joining but hasn't paid ANYTHING toward the people protecting him, because he's too "smart."

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: OK...still not sure what your point is. Not sure why you would call me miss house keeping either. I'm guessing being the small minded person that you are figured that I was Hispanic. Let me guess you rather support a liar and a corrupt politician that has done absolutely nothing for this country. And you probably l demoralize a man that wants to take this country back from people that shouldn't even be here in the first place. You probably also judge a person based on whether they pay their taxes as well just like the millions of illegal immigrants that pay their taxes right? My family and I came to this country and got an education as well as a citizenship the right way. We have payed our dues and I am still paying mine. A proud American and I love this country too much to see it keep getting destroyed by corrupt politicians and liberals that love living off of the government while the rest of us hard working, business owning people pay their bills. ðŸ’¯âœŒðŸ‘Œ
